InterviewResponseButton.EventHandler - Interface in org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.elements
Event handler interface Used for defining the click event handler on a InterviewResponseButton Initialising an event handler: InterviewResponseButton.EventHandler eventHandler = (String name) -> { System.out.println(name + " was pressed"); }; Usage: Used in InterviewResponseBox class on button click InterviewResponseButton.eventHandler.trigger();
